screen_desc: This screenshot shows the eBay login page on a mobile browser. It prompts users to sign in or create an account, with options to continue using Facebook, Google, or Apple. There's a checkbox to stay signed in and a link to learn more about protecting your account on a shared device.
action_think: The user has already emptied the shopping cart and added a product to the cart. The next step is to select checkout.
action_desc: click on the 'Continue with Google' button
action_result: The execution of user request is stopped.
